documentation.text:
Declare the ERC20 interface in order to handle ERC20 tokens transfers to
 and from the Mixer. Note that we only declare the functions we are
 interested in, namely, transferFrom() (used to do a Deposit), and
 transfer() (used to do a withdrawal)

userdoc.notice: Declare the ERC20 interface in order to handle ERC20 tokens transfers to and from the Mixer. Note that we only declare the functions we are interested in, namely, transferFrom() (used to do a Deposit), and transfer() (used to do a withdrawal)
